title: News24.com | Hermanus police official, Athlone supermarket staffer test positive for Covid-19
description: An official at the Hermanus police station and an employee of Shoprite in Athlone are among the latest to test positive for Covid-19 in the Western Cape.
content:
A Hermanus police station official and a person who works at Shoprite in Athlone are among the latest to test positive for Covid-19 in the Western Cape, forcing both organisations to take measures to sanitise the buildings.
Brigadier Donovan Heilbron on Tues… [+2604 chars]
